lead_paragraph: Japan will host the Asian Games for the third time in 2026 after Aichi prefecture and its capital Nagoya were confirmed as the venue for the multi-sport event by the Olympic Council of Asia (OCA) on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Nagoya, Aichi Prefecture to Host 2026 Asian Games
headline.main: Nagoya, Aichi Prefecture to Host 2026 Asian Games
